data.title: Heidi Klum, Tom Kaulitz's Relationship Timeline: Photos
data.meta_description: Heidi Klum secretly married Tom Kaulitz in July 2019 after nearly one year of dating — see their relationship timeline
data.text:
Credit: Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock

Heidi Klum and Husband Tom Kaulitz's Complete Relationship Timeline: Photos

Heidi Klum and Tom Kaulitz haven’t shied away from PDA since first sparking their romance. The Project Runway alum and the Tokio Hotel guitarist were first spotted making out in March 2018, leaving arm-in-arm from a Lorraine Schwartz launch party. Klum’s romance with Kaulitz quickly heated up, and he popped the question in December 2018. The pair secretly wed seven months later before holding a larger ceremony in Capri, Italy, in August 2019. After their nuptials, Tom joined his wife’s blended brood, helping raise her children. Klum shares daughter Leni with ex-boyfriend Flavio Briatore and sons Henry, Johan and Lou with ex-husband Seal, to whom she was married from 2005 to 2014. “[Tom’s] amazing,” she exclusively told Us Weekly in January 2022. “I’m sure it’s not easy to step into an immediate family, having all of a sudden four kids and teenagers.” Scroll below for Klum’s complete relationship timeline with the rocker:

Credit: Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock

Heidi Klum and Husband Tom Kaulitz's Complete Relationship Timeline: Photos

Heidi Klum and Tom Kaulitz haven’t shied away from PDA since first sparking their romance. The Project Runway alum and the Tokio Hotel guitarist were first spotted making out in March 2018, leaving arm-in-arm from a Lorraine Schwartz launch party. Klum’s romance with Kaulitz quickly heated up, and he popped the question in December 2018. The pair secretly wed seven months later before holding a larger ceremony in Capri, Italy, in August 2019. After their nuptials, Tom joined his wife’s blended brood, helping raise her children. Klum shares daughter Leni with ex-boyfriend Flavio Briatore and sons Henry, Johan and Lou with ex-husband Seal, to whom she was married from 2005 to 2014. “[Tom’s] amazing,” she exclusively told Us Weekly in January 2022. “I’m sure it’s not easy to step into an immediate family, having all of a sudden four kids and teenagers.” Scroll below for Klum’s complete relationship timeline with the rocker:

Credit: Joel C Ryan/Invision/AP/Shutterstock

September 2018

“He’s the kindest, sweetest, most caring, loving person,” the America’s Got Talent judge told Us of her beau. “I feel so lucky. I don’t know when I was this happy the last time in my life. I mean, I am with my children, but with, you know, a man. He’s absolutely wonderful. … He’s German, and we maybe understand each other in a different way. But so far, so good!”

Credit: Courtesy Heidi Klum/Instagram

August 2022

The two German natives walked hand-in-hand into the ocean in St. Barths to celebrate three years of marriage together.

"Happy 3 Year Anniversary my L❤️VE," Klum captioned the adorable video of the pair.

Credit: Courtesy Heidi Klum/Instagram

August 2022

During a red carpet appearance for America's Got Talent season 17, Klum joked about how she gets her youthful glow.

"I suck [Tom's] young blood, is what I'm doing — like a vampire," the model quipped to E! News' Daily Pop about her beau, who is 17 years her junior.

The TV star also reflected on their romance to the outlet, saying how the years felt like they "flew by" already. "I just know him so well. We just gel really well. I just feel like, 'Finally, I found The One.' So far so good. I hope it stays that way."

Credit: Stephen Lovekin/Shutterstock

October 2022

“She just came up with the worm. She's like that. She gets up in the morning and she's like, 'I'm gonna be a worm,' and I'm like ‘OK. … I’m running out of options. What can you do with a worm?’ It’s either going to be a fisherman or a gardener or something like that so I decided on a fisherman and now I'm part of the costume. I have on my hook so that's kind of fun.”

He added that putting together the outfits take “hours and hours,” noting that Klum started getting ready at 9 a.m.

When asked whether he felt bad for his spouse as she struggled up and down the carpet, Kaulitz told Us: “Not really because it was her choice. She came up with it. I'm like, ‘Now you gotta push through.’”
